rooms.name: Daniel Cricket Academy
rooms.overview: DANIEL KANAPARTHI, a Level II certified Coach from England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB, United Kingdom), is always passionate for his all time favourite dream game “CRICKET”, has opted it as a career and opened his own Academy - DANIEL’S CRICKET ACADEMY in Hyderabad.Daniel is also an active member of England and Wales Cricket Coaches Association. Having great passion for cricket Daniel has taken up a challenging responsibility of grooming the upcoming players for INDIA.DCA is not just a cricket coaching academy, it has grown as a team, a family with bonding among, students, coaches and parents.
rooms.goals: To maintain quality coaching standards and contribute best cricket players to represent INDIA.Identifying the talented boys having passion for cricket and ensuring wide range of support, encouragement and guidance to achieve the goal.To make coaching facilities available and accessible to the talented boys from towns and villages of Telangana and Andhra Pradesh
rooms.services: Coaching starts at 5:45 a.m. continues till 8:00 a.m. and in the evening starts at 4:00 p.m. continues till 8:00 p.m.Friendly matches are conducted during the weekends.Fitness program - to make the boys both physically and mentally strong. Special emphasis on fielding, bowling and batting.Giving awareness about international standards and rules.Matches are organized under flood lights with 20-20 format on Saturdays and Sundays for children to get them used to difference match situations/conditions.

rooms.name: SVM Bowling Alley Gachibowli
rooms.location: 36/A, Sai Tirumala Platinum Building, Old Mumbai Hwy, Telecom Nagar Extension
rooms.overview: Come Play bowling at SVM Bowling Alley Gachibowli with these amazing offers for all 7 days a week !!
rooms.services: Exclusive offers only on Playo.  From (Monday - Thursday) 10 AM - 1 PM - Rs 99/Game 1 PM - 5 PM - Rs 149/Game 5 PM - 10 PM - Rs 199/Game  From (Friday - Sunday) 10 AM - 1 PM - Rs 180/Game 1 PM - 10 PM - Rs 260/Game  But hey, Buy 9 Games or more on the weekends and you either get a pitcher of BEER free or 2 games free.

rooms.name: CHETAN ANAND BADMINTON ACADEMY
rooms.timing: Morning 5 AM - 7 AM, Evening 4 PM - 6 PM
rooms.overview: Chetan Anand Badminton Academy provides world class badminton coaching to kids  Focus of Academy Impart high quality badminton training to kids In the process of learning the game, kids have fun and inculcate discipline
rooms.goals: Easily accessible Identify young talent and groom them We periodically organize state level competitions
rooms.services: 3 world class badminton courts Parking, Changing room and washroom
rooms.infrastructure: Morning 5 AM - 6 AM, 6 AM - 7 AM ( 2 Batches )  Evening 4 PM - 5 PM, 5 PM - 6 PM, 6 PM - 7 PM ( 3 batches )

rooms.name: PRAXIS SWIMMING
rooms.timing: 6 AM - 10 AM, 4 PM - 9 PM ( Tuesday - Sunday )
rooms.overview: Praxis is one of the best swimming coaching centres in Hyderabad.  Not just swimming, but it provides a range of other fitness activities like Gym,Yoga and Aerobics
rooms.services: No chlorine uses Granules are used for cleaning 24*7 filtration

rooms.name: INSPORTS CRICKET ACADEMY
rooms.overview: Syed Majid, born on 15th of August, 1976 has been a cricket enthusiast since his childhood. He has a profound 10 years of experience as a coach. He hs played many leagues and has been a part of the coaching fertility in various places national and international.  A Level-A Coach, awarded by the federation of cricket academy under former Test cricketer, Arshad Ayuv and the current Fielding coach R.Sridhar. He is now successfully running a cricket academy with a strength of 75+ students(cricket enthusiasts). Award of Recognition was presented to him by the International Association of Lions clubs Leo District, Srilanka.  He has Represented Rajus cricket academy at the 25th RBSC International cricket 6's tournament, Bangkok-Thailand.
rooms.goals: Our vision is to turn out to be the prime cricket academy in the whole Hyderabad, providing quality training and nurturing the talents of many kids.  Our mission is to turn many hidden talents into players on the field and do our part to the National duty.
rooms.services: Syed Majid is the head coach and he trains along with his assistants. He takes care of the tournaments for the skill evaluation and lays foot in molding a skill or talent. His relentless work for the outcome is very well known to his students. The cricket kits and safety pads, everything is provided by the Academy for the safety of the player or trainee.
rooms.infrastructure: Astro Turf Wickets Flood Lights Personal Sessions Professional Coaches Corporate Renting Matting wickets Bowling Machines for skill development

rooms.name: ST. JOHNS CRICKET ACADEMY
rooms.overview: St.John’s Sports coaching Foundation was started way back in 1987 by Mr.M.V Narasimha Rao(Former Test Cricketer) and Mr. John Manoj, with an endeavor of producing world class cricketers who would be serving Hyderabad Ranji Cricket Team and subsequently go on to represent the Indian Cricket Team. Faithfull to its initial calling in the course of time that has spanned over the last 30 years, St.John’s Sports coaching foundation has produced many International and national cricketers of exceptional skill and repute such as the likes of V.V.S Laxman,Noel David ,M.S.K Prasad and Tarun Nethula and many other Ranji,State cricketers who represented Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh and South Zone, the latest to make the cut among the Indian Cricketing circles was G H.Vihari who was not only part of the Indian U-19 Squad that lifted the World Cup(U-19) in Australia but also the member of the current South Zone Team in Deodhar Trophy.  St.John’s Cricket Academy was built on sheer discipline and dedication along with being grounded in the best of technical cricketing skill and expertise that are par excellence and unmatched in Hyderabad ,Andhra Pradesh and also across the Country, St.John’s Cricket Academy consists panel of distinguished coaches (20 in number) who are the best in the business of cricket coaching as many of them were either former or current players who played at the highest levels of Professional Cricket along with a qualified Sports Medicine doctor and trainer.  Many young upcoming players are greatly benefited from not only excellent infrastructure set up but on all the cricketing skills across disciplines such as batting, bowling, fielding and fitness that will be imparted with personal attention on day to day basis throughout the year. In its continued effort to keep serving the country with exceptionally well trained and skilled young cricketers who can serve the Indian Cricket in the long run, we have built the current infrastructure from nothing with whatever resources that were available back then to the current state where in we have 7 Astro Turf, 3 Turf, 2 Matting wickets and 1 Cement pitch and along with the help HUDA we have developed lush green outfield for safety and dust free playing condition for young and budding cricketers.
rooms.goals: Achievements of St.Johns Cricket Academy cannot truly be measured in light of the deep influence and impact it had on Hyderabad and Indian Cricket for good, in terms of the number and quality of Cricketers it has produced over the past 30 years. Just for the Sake of facts and figures we can state that it had produced over 4 International cricketers,30 plus Ranji Players, 44 First class players along with 400 Junior State Cricketers. But the biggest Achievement of it all is the sheer pleasure and joy it has brought to thousands of cricketers and many people who were part of it.
rooms.services: 7 Astro Turf 2 Matting Wickets 1 Cement pitch Green Outfield Gym Video Classroom Bowling machine

rooms.name: RAJU'S CRICKET COACHING ACADEMY
rooms.overview: Raju's Cricket Club was started 18 years ago by G.Sudharshan Raju.18 years ago I decided that it was time I stopped dreaming and started trying to make my dreams a reality. I also desired that bright cricketing talent should not be handicaped due to lack of proper training-something that many people of my time faced. I wanted to provide the best of facilities to nature cricketing talent and to equip them to face the challenges of modern day professional cricket.  Many friends and well-wishers tried to dissuade me from even attempting to achieve such a big dream.But the words of Walt Disney "If you can dream it,you can do it" gave me the courage to work towards materializing my dreams.  Our Institution is proud to have a vast playground in the center of the city and encourage such a wonderfull game. We have provided adequate training infrastructure not only to our school & college childrens but also to many other childrens of Hyderabad and Secunderabad. This was made possible only due to the continuous and committed efforts of a dedicated person like Mr.G.Sudarshan Raju and his academy.
rooms.services: 1. Two Bowling Machines 2. 8 fully covered nets with cement,turf and mat wickets. 3. Digital Video analysis equipment and Software. 4. Indoor cricket facility during summer vacation. 5. Hostel for overseas and out-station trainees. 6. Only Cricket center in India that operates 365 days & 12 hours a day. 7. Floodlight facility. 8. Two cricket grounds.

rooms.name: VVS SPORTS ACADEMY
rooms.overview: “VVS Sports Academy is a tribute to the game that has made me what I am today. My passion for cricket, coupled with the urge to give back to the game has prompted me to come up with the initiative of setting up a cricket academy. Over the years of my playing experience, I have learnt the fine nuances of the game and have been fortunate enough to have access to the latest techniques and methodology of coaching which I want to share with the future stars in the horizon of cricket. I envisioned this academy that would allow dedicated trainees to focus on reaching their potential, while teaching them responsibility, leadership and determination.  I envisage the VVS Sports Academy to be a place where an athlete learns and trains not only to improve his or her game but to explore the opportunities to become a professional. We aspire to grow as an institute that introduces innovations to meet the demands of a growing market. Our commitment to the quality of programs and the creativity and energy of our expert handpicked coaches stimulates a culture of enthusiasm, excellence and innovation that sets us apart. With a vision to create a chain of world class academies with modern day facilities , I am confident that we are on a path to create one of the best cricketing academies in the world.”
rooms.goals: To promote, develop and foster excellence in young cricketers.  To provide an additional path for identifying talented cricketers.  To uphold the spirit of cricket through tough competition and fair play.  To allow talented young cricketers to experience the standards expected of a professional cricketer  To build future leaders within cricket who can take the game forward with strength and integrity
rooms.services: V.V.S.Sports Academy is currently set up on a picturesque, lush, 50 acre campus of the Sreenidhi International School which is on the banks of HimayatSagarlake, Aziznagar, Hyderabad. The campus is eco friendly and expansive as well.  Cricket ground with three turf wickets to play matches. 7 Turf wickets 2 Matting wickets 2 Cement wickets 2 Astro turf wickets Bowling machines Physiotherapy Strength & Conditioning Video Analysis Yoga Gymnasium Nutritional Advice Psychologist Support

rooms.name: WEST DELHI CRICKET ACADEMY
rooms.location: 1A-2 Block, St. Sophia School, Paschim Vihar, New Delhi, Delhi 110063
rooms.overview: There are many criteria which I consider while selecting a kid before the training. Age is a very important aspect. According to me ?sooner the better? concept prevails. The age should be more than 8 years, keeping in mind that child needs some time to be mentally prepare for the game as well with body strong enough to hold the willow. Apart from that I look out for the basic inclination towards the game, the passion and the willingness to work hard and constant surge for improvement. The natural flair is an added advantage. I feel proud to say that Virat possess all these qualities ever since he has joined, at that time he was 8 yr old. I as a coach have to put in lot of extra effort whenever I feel a potential in a kid. I take it as my responsibility to nourish him/her. I have to spend extra hours in observing & correcting. Although my responsibilities include preparing schedule of training, diet, net practice, and gymming for my students
rooms.address: 1A-2 Block, St. Sophia School, Paschim Vihar, New Delhi, Delhi 110063

rooms.name: DRONACHARYA CRICKET FOUNDATION
rooms.location: Near Hanuman Balaji Mandir, Vivek Vihar, New Delhi, Delhi 110092
rooms.overview: The Dronacharya Cricket Foundation boasts of world class infrastructure with 4 excellent turf pitches and 1 Astro-cement pitch for the beginners.  After his superannuation from Sports Authority of India, Mr. Gurcharan Singh did not sit idle to enjoy the retired life. He sent a proposal to Delhi Development Authority (DDA) to set up a Cricket Coaching Centre in the East of Delhi. The proposal was accepted and the Dronacharya Cricket Foundation was established on the 11th June 2000 at Yamuna Sports Complex.
rooms.address: Near Hanuman Balaji Mandir, Vivek Vihar, New Delhi, Delhi 110092

rooms.name: SEHWAG CRICKET ACADEMY
rooms.location: X-12, Hauz Khas Road, Hauz Khas Main Market, New Delhi, Delhi 110016
rooms.overview: The foundation of the Sehwag Cricket Academy was laid by Virender Sehwag with the sole aim of providing quality cricket training, world-class cricketing infrastructure, and opportunity to learn from experts in the field of cricket through a fun and innovative environment.  The flagship cricket academy was founded in 23-acre eco-friendly campus at Jhajjar, on the outskirts of Gurgaon, Haryana in the year 2011, with an emphasis to provide students with best-in-class cricket facilities and training. This all-year-round academy integrates the best in cricketing techniques, technology, and coaches to develop a World-Class Cricketer of Tomorrow.  For the overall development of the young cricketer, strength improvement through other games – swimming, tennis, football – mini tournaments, and sessions with specialists are organised, based on the ability, age group and expertise level of the players.
rooms.address: X-12, Hauz Khas Road, Hauz Khas Main Market, New Delhi, Delhi 110016

rooms.name: MADAN LAL CRICKET ACADEMY
rooms.location: DDA Siri Fort Sports Complex, August Kranti Marg, Khelgaon, Behind Siri Fort Auditorium, New Delhi, Delhi 110049
rooms.overview: Madan Lal Cricket Academy managed by Matchcraft Sports Management. Madanlal Academy brings Cricket and Education together in India with Amenity School of Education adanlal Academy create talent, nurture them with regressive training sessions and make them stand out leaders. We are fortunate to have with us highly respected and brilliant coach in the form of Mr. Madan Lal former Indian Test Cricketer.Individual coaching sessions can be arranged with Madan Lal one to one coaching specifically for the individual. We intend picking up few of the boys from schools and hopefully, the ‘best’ and ‘most talented’ can possibly represent the country in the under 19 category
rooms.address: DDA Siri Fort Sports Complex, August Kranti Marg, Khelgaon, Behind Siri Fort Auditorium, New Delhi, Delhi 110049

rooms.name: HARBEER CRICKET ACADEMY
rooms.location: Opp.Japanese Park, Sector 9, Rohini west, Delhi, 110085
rooms.overview: Neo Convent School functions with an exalted aim of providing excellent education opportunities to the students irrespective of caste, creed or religion. Its motto “Knowledge Thy Wealth” explains all that the school stands for.  The initiative to further the cause of education through this school was taken by “Neo Gursikh Education Society”. The aforesaid registered Society with the Managing Committee looks after and controls the activities of the school.  The School was recognized by Delhi Administration and by M.C.D in 1976. Upgradation for Senior Secondary stage was granted by Delhi Administration in 1992. The school is affiliated with CBSE up to Senior Secondary level. Currently affiliation is granted till 2018.  The aim of the school is to create an academic and physical environment of a nature, which helps the children to become ideal members of the society develop skills and knowledge which is the envy of all and lastly, have a disciplined character embodied with the spiritual values of our Gurus.
rooms.address: Opp.Japanese Park, Sector 9, Rohini west, Delhi, 110085

rooms.name: EXTRA TIME FOOTBALL ACADEMY
rooms.location: Vasant Vatika, Opposite DPS Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070
rooms.overview: ExtraTime Football Academy will be providing you with a chance to improve your footballing skills and help you learn new techniques and tactics.
rooms.address: Vasant Vatika, Opposite DPS Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070

rooms.name: FCBESCOLA FOOTBALL SCHOOL - WEST DELHI
rooms.location: Shivaji College Sports Complex iOS Maidan, Shivaji Enclave, Tagore Garden Extension, New Delhi, Delhi 110018
rooms.overview: Conscient Football is a grassroots development initiative undertaken by the Conscient Group with the Heritage Schools network in Delhi NCR; the latter being a part of its ventures in the education sector, as an extension of its wider portfolio.  Conscient Football is dedicated to raising the bar in football programming at the grassroots level by reaching out to children across Delhi NCR in the initial years, and its exclusive collaboration with one of the world's greatest football clubs- FC Barcelona is one of the various steps taken in that direction.  The greater aim is to establish a nationwide footprint with its football development activities over the next few years whilst establishing the foundation in terms of a feeder program for FCBEscola- the world-class football school imparting high-class football education catering to the best players found within its programs. The FCBEscola which will be at the apex of CF's football development pyramid, and will be run by Technical Director from FC Barcelona and will aim to put forth the best football players in the country who aspire to pursue the game professionally at the elite level.
rooms.goals: Make Indian youth achieve world football standards  Create centres of excellence in football  Make students and parents aware of need for physical exercise and enjoying a good game.
rooms.address: Shivaji College Sports Complex iOS Maidan, Shivaji Enclave, Tagore Garden Extension, New Delhi, Delhi 110018

rooms.name: PHOENIX FOOTBALL ACADEMY
rooms.location: DDA Sports Complex, Muni Maya Ram Jain Marg, Pitampura, Delhi, 110034
rooms.overview: Phoenix Sports Academy is an upcoming dynamic sports management group run by passionate professionals. Our motive is to establish Sports as an integral part of youth development at all stages.  Phoenix Sports Academy is a football academy providing high quality football coaching courses for boys and girls in Pitampura, Rohini, Ashok Vihar, Lawrence Road, Delhi and nearby areas.  Established over five years we are proud to be known for helping children to become more proficient in the game of soccer in a fun and friendly environment. We offer structured and organized football coaching sessions led by experienced and coaches.  Whether your kids are just looking for a fun time or want to develop their football interests and skills further, we provide a platform for your children to enjoy the game whilst receiving expert football coaching.
rooms.address: DDA Sports Complex, Muni Maya Ram Jain Marg, Pitampura, Delhi, 110034
